name: Cultural Sponge
description: Cultural Sponge is dynamic graphic design, web design, marketing, and social media company based in the Phoenix Arizona metro area. Our business was originally developed as a graphic design company, so it’s no wonder we’re the branding experts! Since then we have expanded to offer clients a complete package when it comes to their marketing. We offer everything from logo designs, marketing leads, websites, social media accounts, photography, and much more!
